comment.body: Favorites won't stick for me either, happens when I close my browser, my browser is set to clear active logins & cookies on close if that matters any.

Suggestion: I think it would look really neat and add a huge visual effect if the peer/seed globe had a slow continuous spin and was still turn-able on the mousedown event. If performance is an issue, make it a toggle. :)   Just IMO, Thanks for reading.

For me, Zeronet has always been a hot & interesting topic to discuss with others.   

Everyone loves hearing about these kinds of technology that was once dreamed of. Especially when it has the potential for offline browsing.

Best of luck, and I'm sure everything is going to go great!
